alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Manatee, southwestern Hillsborough and northwestern Sarasota Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lakewood Ranch, or 13 miles northeast of Sarasota. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sarasota, Bradenton, Palmetto, Anna Maria, Greater Sun Center, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Memphis, West Samoset, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, The Meadows, Parrish, South Sarasota, Kensington Park, Lakewood Ranch, Ellenton and Sarasota Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
